content.description: Sit start with a left hand undercling and a right hand sidepull on the arete. From there, pull up to a left hand bump, follow with a right hand sidepull to the arete's elbow, reach a decent left hand edge, bring the feet along, follow to an edge on the slab, and top it out.
content.protection: A pair of pads. The landing is good but not great. The immediate fall zone is great, but there are some nasty rocks just to the left of the problem.
content.location:
It climbs the center of Tomek's east face, just left of

In the Pines

and right of

Mildew Harvest

.

content.description: Sit start with a pair of edges. From there, pull and place a good left heel hook, then work up through edges and bumps to the lip, reach an edge on the slab, and mantel atop the boulder.
content.protection: A pair of pads. The landing is great, but there is a tree behind the fall zone.
content.location:
It climbs the center of Tomek's east face, just right of

Able Drip

and left of

Will Is The Weapon

.

content.description: Sit start with a left hand sidepull and a right hand edge. From there, gain a right hand edge, follow to a left hand sidepull sloper, stick a right hand crimp, and finish straight up for an easy mantel.
content.protection: A pad will work well. The landing is great.
content.location:
It climbs the south face of Tomek, just right of

Canyon Debts

.

content.description: Sit start with your choice of edge. From there, reach the edge rail above, then a right hand pocket, match at the lip, and then reach a high edge for an easy mantel.
content.protection: A pair of pads. The landing is shared with a benign rock, but you'll still want a pad or spot for the topout.
content.location: It climbs the center of Tomek's east face.

content.description: Sit start with your choice of edge. From there, reach and match on a pinch, then gain the edges above, set and dyno (may go statically) to the lip, and press out the finish.
content.protection: A pair of pads will work well. The landing is good, but there are some rocks that surround the landing.
content.location: It climbs the north section of Tomek's east face.

content.description: Sit start at the undercut southwest arete. From there, make a tricky first slap up the arete, gain your feet, then cruise the remaining arete for an easy mantel.
content.protection: A pair of pads. The landing is great.
content.location: It climbs the southwest arete of Tomek.

content.description: Sit start with hands matched on the shelf-edge. From there, reach and match on the sloping shelf above, stick a right hand on the arete, gain the edges above, and rock onto the slab to reach the boulder's apex and finish.
content.protection: A pair of pads will work well. The landing is good, but there is a rock that lies squarely in the landing.
content.location: It climbs the north face of Tomek.

climbs.name: Around the Bend of Cobbled War

content.description: Sit start with hands matched on the large hueco the boulder's northwest arete. From there, follow the lip up and left using the generous pockets, reach the edges below the apex, rock onto the face, and reach an easy mantel.
content.protection: A pair of pads will work well. The landing is great, but there is a rock near the mid-point that may require padding.
content.location: It climbs the northwest arete of Tomek.

content.description: Sit start with hands matched on the shelf. From there, pull up to a great set of jugs, and work slight left and up for an easy mantel.
content.protection: A pad will do it. The landing is great.
content.location:
It climbs the southeast face of Tomek, just right of

Judicial Winds of Chase

.
